background: Born in Nanzhao Kingdom as a descendant of the Nuwa clan, raised in seclusion on Xianling Island by her mother Qing’er, away from the world.
Lost her mother in childhood due to her protection, adopted by the Moon Palace Mistress, growing up isolated with a pure and gentle nature.
Met Li Xiaoyao at age 10, forming a bond that shaped her destiny, later embarking on a journey tied to her Nuwa lineage.
Living near water, she developed a deep connection to nature and water, loving flowers and breezes, curious about the outside world.
Ultimately transformed into a divine tree to save the world, her brief life leaving a legacy of tenderness and regret.
